abilities.name: Death’s Heads
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, each time a friendly **NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA** unit makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Daemonic Icon
abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

abilities.name: Instrument of Chaos
abilities.rule: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Daemonic Icon
wargear_abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

wargear_abilities.name: Instrument of Chaos
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options: ■ 1 Plague Drone that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.
■ 1 Plague Drone that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
unit_composition:
